content.rendered:
BEAUTY FAVORITES

Eyebrows are trending all over Instagram. Some are crazy glitter, tattooed perfection, but many people are starting to rock more thick, natural brows. The days of pencil thin eyebrows are really out and thick natural brows are in. Thicker brows also give you a youthful appearance. I have some exciting, new products I have developed to keep those eyebrows in check and keep all my lashettes looking fabulash. 
 
D’Precision Brow Pencil
The D’Micro precision brow pencil has a built-in grooming brush. This brow pencil allows you to fill your brows effortlessly to help create a fuller brow. My pencil has an easy to blend formula and will last for up to 10 hours. You can have full, natural brows while keeping a defined, polished look. The pencil is filled with vitamin C & E to help keep skin soft. The D’Precision pencil is easy to use. Start by drawing with small upward strokes following the brow shape, creating the length and angle of the arch you desire to have. 
 
D’Browblender Pencil
The D’Dual-ended pencil has a unique brush tip that blends and shapes brows for a full, natural look. My pencil is mineral oil free. It is filled with Vitamins C & E to condition and protects your skin. You can use the D’Browblender pencil to draw desired brow line and to fill-in brows. Then use the brush end to shape and soften lines of your brow. 
Both of these pencils come in a variety of colors to fit everyone’s needs. Head over to my website today to grab the perfect pencil to keep your brows looking fabulash.
 
Beauty Favorites 
Also, I’m excited about these new beauty products that I can’t wait to get my hands on. Nordstrom.com exclusive Valentino parfum. Cult favorite “Naked Heat” eyeshadow palette from Urban Decay but in mini! Another Nordstrom exclusive “Set & Glow Trio” travel-sized powders and highlighter from Laura Mercier. And 111Skin rose gold facial brightening mask. Also, everyone is going crazy for jade rollers! Shiffa jade roller stimulates blood circulation and lymphatic drainage. 
 
Until next time!
 
LOVE DIONNE
